statements: SELECT * FROM deforestation_biodiversity;
SELECT biodiversity_index, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_biodiversity;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_biodiversity ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC;
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5;
SELECT AVG(biodiversity_index) FROM deforestation_biodiversity;
SELECT spatial_data, biodiversity_index, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5 ORDER BY biodiversity_index DESC
SELECT MAX(biodiversity_index) AS max_biodiversity, AVG(deforestation_rate) AS avg_deforestation FROM deforestation_biodiversity
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_records FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE deforestation_rate < 0.1
SELECT biodiversity_index, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE ST_Contains(spatial_data, POINT(0, 0))
SELECT * FROM deforestation_biodiversity WHERE deforestation_rate >= 0.2 ORDER BY biodiversity_index ASC
SELECT * FROM DeforestationEffects;
SELECT id, region FROM SpatialData WHERE latitude > 0;
SELECT region, biodiversity_index FROM DeforestationEffects WHERE region = 'Amazon';
SELECT * FROM SpatialData ORDER BY longitude DESC;
SELECT region, SUM(deforestation_area) AS total_deforestation_area FROM DeforestationEffects GROUP BY region;
SELECT region, deforestation_area FROM DeforestationEffects WHERE biodiversity_index > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationEffects ORDER BY deforestation_area DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT region FROM DeforestationEffects;
SELECT region, latitude, longitude FROM SpatialData WHERE latitude BETWEEN 30.0 AND 40.0;
SELECT region, SUM(deforestation_area) AS total_deforestation FROM DeforestationEffects GROUP BY region;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data WHERE threat_level='Endangered';
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM biodiversity_data ORDER BY species_name ASC;
SELECT region, deforestation_rate FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 0.5 ORDER BY deforestation_rate DESC;
SELECT * FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_Within(geom, ST_GeomFromText('POLYGON((0 0, 0 10, 10 10, 10 0, 0 0))'));
SELECT location_name, area FROM spatial_data WHERE area > 100 ORDER BY area ASC;
SELECT * FROM biodiversity_data WHERE threat_level = 'Endangered' ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT id, latitude, longitude FROM biodiversity_data WHERE latitude < 0 AND longitude > 0;
SELECT species_name, latitude, longitude FROM biodiversity_data WHERE latitude BETWEEN -90 AND 90;
SELECT * FROM deforestation_data WHERE deforestation_rate > 2 ORDER BY deforestation_rate ASC;
SELECT location_name, ST_AsText(geom) FROM spatial_data WHERE ST_Area(geom) > 1000;
SELECT * FROM DeforestationEffects;
SELECT Location, BiodiversityImpact FROM DeforestationEffects WHERE DeforestationArea > 1000;
SELECT SpeciesName, Habitat, ThreatenedStatus FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY SpeciesName ASC;
SELECT RegionName, VegetationType FROM ForestRegions WHERE RegionArea < 5000 ORDER BY RegionArea DESC;
SELECT LocationID, Latitude, Longitude FROM SpatialData WHERE Elevation > 1000;
SELECT Location, DeforestationArea FROM DeforestationEffects WHERE BiodiversityImpact = 'High';
SELECT SpeciesName, Habitat, ThreatenedStatus FROM BiodiversityData ORDER BY SpeciesName DESC;
SELECT Longitude, Latitude FROM SpatialData WHERE Elevation > 1000 ORDER BY Latitude ASC;
SELECT RegionName, RegionArea, VegetationType FROM ForestRegions WHERE RegionArea < 5000 ORDER BY RegionArea DESC;
SELECT Location, DeforestationArea, BiodiversityImpact FROM DeforestationEffects WHERE BiodiversityImpact != 'Low' ORDER BY DeforestationArea DESC;
SELECT * FROM species_table ORDER BY species_name DESC;
SELECT species_name, extinction_status FROM species_table WHERE extinction_status = true;
SELECT species_name, location_point FROM species_table WHERE species_category = 'Mammal' LIMIT 5;
SELECT forest_name, forest_area FROM forest_table WHERE forest_area > 10000 ORDER BY forest_area ASC;
SELECT biodiversity_index, species_id FROM biodiversity_table JOIN species_table ON biodiversity_table.species_id = species_table.species_id;
SELECT * FROM species_table
SELECT species_name, species_category FROM species_table ORDER BY species_name DESC
SELECT species_name, extinction_status FROM species_table WHERE extinction_status = TRUE
SELECT species_name, location_point FROM species_table WHERE species_category = 'Mammal' ORDER BY species_name LIMIT 5

SELECT forest_name, forest_area FROM forest_table JOIN deforestation_table ON forest_table.forest_id = deforestation_table.forest_id WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY forest_area DESC
